    SearchIndexerUpdateStrategy

    public class SearchIndexerUpdateStrategyLastModified
extends AbstractCrawlingDeltaSearchIndexer
    This is the implementation of the SearchIndexerUpdateStrategy for SearchIndexerSource.UPDATE_STRATEGY_VCS.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

        protected ChangeType getChangeType(BrowsableResource resource,
                                   UpdateStrategyArguments arguments)
        This method determines the ChangeType of the given resource.
        Overrides:
        getChangeType in class AbstractSearchIndexerUpdateStrategy
        Parameters:
        resource - is the BrowsableResource for which to determine the ChangeType.
        arguments - are the UpdateStrategyArguments.
        Returns:
        the ChangeType indicating how the given resource shall be updated or null to indicate that the resource shall remain unchanged.
